segments.text: Hi , my name is Pete . You are Ann . Isn't that right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi Pete , how do you know my name ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you see that girl in the red top ? She told me who you were .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I met her last week at a party . Anyway , you must be from the United States ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually I live in London , but my family lives in Seattle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I am from London as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where in London do you live ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In Wimbledon - quite close to the tennis courts actually . Which is very nice because I love tennis .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I play tennis there every week . Shall we have a game one day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be lovely . But now let's go and get a drink .
segments.speaker: S2
